48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Shu'ba with the same chain of transmitters but. with a slight variation of wording

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّسْبِيحِ أَوَّلَ النَّهَارِ وَعِنْدَ النَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: The Tasbih At The Beginning Of The Day And When Going To Sleep
